amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to prohibit U.S. military presence in Syria without Congressional approval within one year of the bill's enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 141 - 286 (Roll no. 276).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A015) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Bowman.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 141 - 286 (Roll no. 276).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bowman amendment (A015) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 141 - 286 (Roll no. 276).
